棲息.definition: (of a bird) to perch; (of creatures in general) to inhabit; to dwell

棲身.definition: to stay at; to live in (temporarily)

棲霞.definition: Qixia, county-level city in Yantai 煙台|烟台, Shandong

棲霞區.definition: Qixia District of Nanjing City 南京市 in Jiangsu 江蘇|江苏

棲霞市.definition: Qixia, county-level city in Yantai 煙台|烟台, Shandong
